channel.title: 《Please help me to test scim for N800》的评论

item.title: 作者：solomon
item.dc:creator: solomon
item.description: 谁能发个scim的设置啊 装了SCIM后无法出来软键盘，没办法在n800上输入啊
item.content:encoded:
谁能发个scim的设置啊
装了SCIM后无法出来软键盘，没办法在n800上输入啊

item.title: 作者：killer
item.dc:creator: killer
item.description:
浏览器 里可以显示中文也可以输入
但NOTES 里不能显示中文 怎么回事啊?TXT文件不行
item.content:encoded:
浏览器 里可以显示中文也可以输入

但NOTES 里不能显示中文
怎么回事啊?TXT文件不行

item.title: 作者：ppip
item.dc:creator: ppip
item.description: 怎么样能够暂时关闭uim，使用nokia自己的him输入系统？
item.content:encoded: 怎么样能够暂时关闭uim，使用nokia自己的him输入系统？

item.title: 作者：comliang
item.dc:creator: comliang
item.description:
本人安装了maemocjk中文输入，但显示不出中文。那位先生能指点本人如何在启用cjk内的smart pinyin后，使中文的输入法显示。先谢了。
I have installed the maemocjk, but I don't know how to bring out the Chinese smart pinyin to the screen. I hope someone would help me. Thanks.
item.content:encoded:
本人安装了maemocjk中文输入，但显示不出中文。那位先生能指点本人如何在启用cjk内的smart pinyin后，使中文的输入法显示。先谢了。

I have installed the maemocjk, but I don't know how to bring out the Chinese smart pinyin to the screen. I hope someone would help me. Thanks.

item.title: 作者：wolfg
item.dc:creator: wolfg
item.description: Yes, the original vkb is disabled in early versions. You should try newest beta version at MaemoCJK(http://maemocjk.garage.maemo.org/beta_release.html). This version allows you to switch input method on-the-fly.
item.content:encoded: Yes, the original vkb is disabled in early versions. You should try newest beta version at MaemoCJK(http://maemocjk.garage.maemo.org/beta_release.html). This version allows you to switch input method on-the-fly.

item.title: 作者：wil
item.dc:creator: wil
item.description: hi, after i have installed the scim software. the original keyboard was replaced by a plain 1. the thumbboard and handwriting doesnt work anymore. is this normal? whenever i tried to start 'teach handwriting', an internal error message pops out.
item.content:encoded: hi, after i have installed the scim software. the original keyboard was replaced by a plain 1. the thumbboard and handwriting doesnt work anymore. is this normal? whenever i tried to start 'teach handwriting', an internal error message pops out.

item.title: 作者：mcdyess
item.dc:creator: mcdyess
item.description: 谁能发一下具体的设置过程，我研究半天还是搞不明白。多谢了。
item.content:encoded: 谁能发一下具体的设置过程，我研究半天还是搞不明白。多谢了。

item.title: 作者：bb8715
item.dc:creator: bb8715
item.description: Thanks!!!My nokia 800 can typing chinese,that is great!!!!!!!!!!!
item.content:encoded: Thanks!!!My nokia 800 can typing chinese,that is great!!!!!!!!!!!

item.title: 作者：boysmile
item.dc:creator: boysmile
item.description: 需要先安装什么软件啊？小弟的直接点击安装不了啊。
item.content:encoded: 需要先安装什么软件啊？小弟的直接点击安装不了啊。

item.title: 作者：hiei
item.dc:creator: hiei
item.description: 用了，输入很不错，比maemo cjk里面的uim反应速度要快。 建议下一版本将scim面板调整一下，默认情况下scim的面板太占地方了。 另外，多加一个五笔输入法吧，我相信有人用的着。 btw: 看来国内internet tablet 的玩家还是不错呢 :)
item.content:encoded:
用了，输入很不错，比maemo cjk里面的uim反应速度要快。
建议下一版本将scim面板调整一下，默认情况下scim的面板太占地方了。
另外，多加一个五笔输入法吧，我相信有人用的着。
btw: 看来国内internet tablet 的玩家还是不错呢 :)

item.title: 作者：HOPE
item.dc:creator: HOPE
item.description: 初步效果还不错，我放了个截图在我的博客上： http://www.51nb.com/space/index.php/1/action_viewspace_itemid_2469.html
item.content:encoded:

item.title: 作者：HOPE
item.dc:creator: HOPE
item.description: 又重启了一次，终于出来了，用上了，效果还不错。 多谢了，先试用看看什么情况再回头帖。
item.content:encoded:
又重启了一次，终于出来了，用上了，效果还不错。
多谢了，先试用看看什么情况再回头帖。

item.title: 作者：HOPE
item.dc:creator: HOPE
item.description: 到底怎么设置的呀？在设置窗口里面点击选择了智能拼音，还是出不来，再进去设置又是没有选择上。
item.content:encoded: 到底怎么设置的呀？在设置窗口里面点击选择了智能拼音，还是出不来，再进去设置又是没有选择上。

item.title: 作者：ah.sima
item.dc:creator: ah.sima
item.description:
there are some problems: 1. sometimes, the scim toolbar will lost and not appear any more. 2. it seems system becomes to be slow and application startup time will take much time than before.(after this package is installed) 3. loadapplet often displays full cpu load when in chinese input mode. 4. cursor positioning and text selection seem to be of problem(slow, can not move sometimes, can not select sometimes). 5. display area of current cursor position scroll up to outside of screen display. 6. cursor sometimes position to the up one or two line. 7. setting interface with some item can not displayed or overlapped. 8. selection table display positioning problem: sometimes disapear when move, mask some text of input document or vkb display.
9. prefer the original nokia vkb system can easily get when needed. 10.prefer the uninstall can uninstall all related compnents (not have to uninstall manually one by one.
(anyway, it is a great work. thank you, guoyong)
(written on n800. as scim toolbar disapear, i can not input chinese.)
item.content:encoded:
there are some problems:
1. sometimes, the scim toolbar will lost and not appear any more.
2. it seems system becomes to be slow and application startup time will take much time than before.(after this package is installed)
3. loadapplet often displays full cpu load when in chinese input mode.
4. cursor positioning and text selection seem to be of problem(slow, can not move sometimes, can not select sometimes).
5. display area of current cursor position scroll up to outside of screen display.
6. cursor sometimes position to the up one or two line.
7. setting interface with some item can not displayed or overlapped.
8. selection table display positioning problem: sometimes disapear when move, mask some text of input document or vkb display.

9. prefer the original nokia vkb system can easily get when needed.
10.prefer the uninstall can uninstall all related compnents (not have to uninstall manually one by one.

(anyway, it is a great work. thank you, guoyong)

(written on n800. as scim toolbar disapear, i can not input chinese.)

item.title: 作者：Keyser Soze
item.dc:creator: Keyser Soze
item.description: 有好用的截屏工具吗? 我可以晚上回家用相机拍一个发给你。:)
item.content:encoded: 有好用的截屏工具吗? 我可以晚上回家用相机拍一个发给你。:)
